name: Bogdan's Cross
description: Embark on a journey of redemption as Bogdan, a fallen Templar seeking to make amends for his past sins. Explore a stunning world filled with ancient mysteries, uncover hidden secrets, and battle fierce enemies in this immersive action-adventure game.

name: Precious Stones
description: This is a physics-based platform game where players control a sphere to collect diamonds while avoiding obstacles and hazards. The game requires players to use their knowledge of physics to navigate through levels filled with slopes and moving platforms.

name: Entity Room
description: Entity Room is a short indie horror game, in which you're working in an underground lab. Your job is to ensure the entity is being fed every day and the rooms are cleaned afterwards.

name: Craft Of Mine
description: Your uncle, an employee from Mojang Studios, the company that develops Minecraft; has disappeared with no seeming reason. Sad for your uncle, you go to your room to play that same game, still unknowing of the answers you would be getting.

name: Witch Market
description:
Beginning of a fairytale-like journey, Witch Market!
Run a witch’s vending machine on the fantastical Greed Island!

name: Metria
description:
The starlight is our hope.
An RPG where hope and sin collide.

name: Let's Create! Pottery 2
description:
Get relief from Stress!

Experience calmness, tranquility, and enhance your emotional and mental well-being by making art a part of your day-to-day life.

"Let's Create! Pottery 2" is a unique game that will reduce stress while also stimulate your imagination. Become a real artist and create "one of a kind" pottery objects. Enjoy the zen-like, relaxing experience of the pottery workshop and discover the creative genius in you.

name: 9mm
description: Sin descripción

name: Quester
description: Quester is a role-playing game for PC, released by Thousand Games on 2023. Kazushi Hagiwara was deeply involved in the production and based on his suggestions, it was produced by Thousand Games. It's an indie game and includes hack and slash.

name: Kamikaze Pigs
description: A Flash-based, chain reaction game in where players must fry as many pigs as possible. The pigs are on edge and will fire at the first sign of trouble, causing further chaos and combos. Once the player gets enough money and stars, they can purchase upgrades in the shop to grant the pigs more guns and explosives to keep combos going.

name: Webkinz Next
description: Build your family of pets in the home of your dreams while playing fun games and hanging out with friends.

name: Nonograms Katana
description:
Nonograms Katana: Sharpen your mind!

Nonograms, also known as Hanjie, Griddlers, Picross, Japanese Crosswords, Japanese Puzzles, Pic-a-Pix, "Paint by numbers" and other names, are picture logic puzzles in which cells in a grid must be colored or left blank according to numbers at the side of the grid to reveal a hidden picture. The numbers are a form of discrete tomography that measures how many unbroken lines of filled-in squares there are in any given row or column. For example, a clue of "4 8 3" would mean there are sets of four, eight, and three filled squares, in that order, with at least one blank square between successive groups.
To solve a puzzle, one needs to determine which cells will be boxes and which will be empty. Determining which cells are to be left empty (called spaces) is as important as determining which to fill (called boxes). Later in the solving process, the spaces help determine where a clue (continuing block of boxes and a number in the legend) may spread. Solvers usually use a dot or a cross to mark cells they are certain are spaces.
It is also important never to guess. Only cells that can be determined by logic should be filled. If guessing, a single error can spread over the entire field and completely ruin the solution.

name: George Pontos: The Stolen Lyre
description: In this action dangerous dungeons platformer game you are on a quest to find the lost instrument lyra. However, when George is on his way to find the instrument he is met by obstacles and bunch of crazy barbarians and other deadly dangers in this classic platform game. You don't always have to kill your enemies, you can also avoid them to save your dynamite and ammo. You have to be careful, you are in a world dangerous and spears are shot from some dungeons platforms.

name: Legerdemain
description: A surreal fantasy RPG inspired by roguelike games and interactive fiction. Become a magician in the world of Phenomedom! Escape from prison! Learn rituals! Collect paragraphs! Converse with conjoined twins! Do battle with wild and original enemies, including pookahs, imp-imps, and boogadah dream porridge. Altogether there are dozens of areas to explore, hundreds of original monsters to slay, and nearly two hundred citizens brimming with lies and idle gossip.

name: Webkinz Friends
description: Ganz brings the fun of Webkinz to Facebook with a new social twist, enabling parents and teens to build the Kinzville of their dreams with the added benefit of sending prizes to any Webkinz World account from Facebook.

name: La Linea
description:
A simple little game that requires mathematical skills, inspired by an Italian cartoon that
Rajcsányi László loved a lot when he was a child, but even now. The game is recommended for ages 8 and up, only for those who want a quick little game that can be played through in seconds with a little math.

name: Xzap
description:
You are a lone Xzapper, last survivor of an advanced civilisation.Many centuries ago, your planet was besieged by alien hordes. Now only you remain. The aliens have the advantage of numbers, but you are on home territory. Your mission is to collect energy berries left on the tracks and complete all 12 levels.

The game was probably never released independently, only as part of a collection that came with the Commodore 16. The gameboy version does not follow the original game where you have to shoot. In this version you have to collect points, but the graphics solutions are very similar.

name: Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions
description: Your next chapter takes flight! Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Quidditch by playing solo or sharing the magic with friends and family.

name: Katana Infinity
description: Discover Zero's first mission after the war and a new mysterious character : Infinity.

name: Undone
description: The tagline for this short piece of interactive fiction is, "a lifetime of doubts in an instant of self-destruction." Undone unfolds in the moments between two scenes at a research lab in Antarctica. Text and images explore topics in consciousness, organization, physics, and dreams.

description: Port of Happy Tennis from the Sport Vii.

name: Play TV Football
description: This interactive football video game system plugs directly into a television and translates players' running movements to control game play, allowing two players to compete against each other or play on the same team. Players stand on the control pad and step on left and right direction indicators to avoid tacklers and collect power-ups such as invincibility, earthquake, speed, and more. The football-shaped game paddle controls play selection, executes hand-offs for running plays, and allows you to throw passes. Requires four AA batteries. Ages 8 and up. 18 1/2" L x 14 1/2" W. (4 lbs.)

name: Fencing
description: Sin descripción

name: Beach Volleyball
description: Sin descripción

name: Im Doing Better Now
description: Im Doing Better Now is a moody visual novel by warning stripe.

name: Don't Destroy The Rocket
description:
In this small but nice action game you control a rocket and have to bring it safely to the target. Try not to collide with the environment, because that is not good for the rocket. You have the tools you need to get ahead. There is also a hidden collectible in each level.
Are you curious? What are you waiting for. Download Don't Destroy The Rocket today and become a rocket master.

name: Pudding Bubble
description: Pudding Bubble is bubble shoot game with cute pudding graphic.

name: Frog!
description: Go and have a challenge!! Meet the Frog from the pond. He need to collect all those stars to turn himself into a prince.

name: Terralith
description: Terralith is a Minecraft datapack designed to fundamentally overhaul the overworld with new biomes and caves. It accomplishes this without adding any new blocks, making it fully compatible with vanilla clients.

name: Dino Dash
description: Sin descripción

name: Sark Word Game
description:
Sark is unlike any word game you have played: a challenging addictive intergalactic brain battle you can play by yourself, with friends, and with players around the world!

25 letter cards are dealt one at a time from a 54-card deck. A player places each letter in their Sark Square (a 5x5 matrix) to form 3, 4, and 5-letter words across and down. Games last on average 5-10 minutes. A perfect score is 70 but there is no record of anyone scoring more than 60, and 50 is rare!

name: Spiritrest
description: Short atmospheric adventure game.

name: Touhou Juuouen: Unfinished Dream of All Living Ghost.
description: Touhou Juuouen: Unfinished Dream of All Living Ghost is the 19th official installment of the Touhou Project. It was announced by ZUN on April 18, 2023 (JST).

name: Starfire
description:
Starfire is an action RPG for PC-9800, initially designed by Winston Douglas Wood (of Phantasie fame) and developed by StarCraft Inc. as a successor to Star Command. The game underwent major changes during the development and eventually became a more straightforward dungeon/space shooter RPG running on the Might & Magic 3 engine.

In this game, you are a member of a mercenary squad of infantry mechs contracted by the government to do dirty jobs. Eventually you gain access to a space ship and travel the galaxy to deal with an alien invasion.

name: Super Mario Land 3: Tatanga's Return
description: Super Mario World hack by Gamma V. This hack contains 60 levels spread across 7 Worlds.

name: Jigsaw Kitties
description: A cute jigsaw puzzle game with over 60 cute cartoon kitties to unlock

name: Funny Sunny
description: Get ready to shine bright and collect the stars in the whimsical world of 'Funny Sunny' - the ultimate billiards-style game!

name: Ghost Motel 1
description: Joseph Winter has recently passed away and now must check into the Ghost Motel.

name: Condemned: The Prequel Story
description: You play as Agent Mallory and you're on assignment to track down a serial killer that might be the infamous Bone Cutter.

name: Alcohol & Ammo
description: You go shootin' with your friend Jeb.

name: I'm on a Watcher Duty
description: This is a fangame of "I'm on Observation Duty" which originally created by Notovia (Zaster). This fangame is made by Paulor94.

name: Incendium
description: Incendium is a Minecraft datapack designed to completely overhaul the Nether using only vanilla blocks. In addition to extending the Nether's generation height to 192, Incendium adds 8 all-new biomes and 9 new structures with new custom mobs, items, and advancements. Terrain is also overhauled, with jagged mountains, twisting caves, and much more.

name: Nullscape
description:
The End is a barren, depressing, bleak place. As it should be, and always will be.

Nullscape is a Minecraft datapack designed to overhaul the End's generation in a way that maintains this identity - a realm of utter desolation. Nullscape will make you feel tiny and alone in the vast expanse of the End. You against the void - nothing more than that.

name: Invitationem
description: The night is dark, and the rain keep hitting the windshield of your car. An inexplicable breakdown forces you to stop, and to keep going on foot. This is when you spot, a few hundred yards ahead, the glow of a strange forgotten house in the middle of the woods.

name: Structory
description: Structory is a seasonally updated, atmospheric structure mod/datapack with light lore for Minecraft.

name: Just Kiss Her Already!
description: Just Kiss Her Already! is a fluffy girls love story about Nanala (from Just Kiss Him Already!) attempting to get a girlfriend!

name: Wireless Air 60
description: The Wireless Air 60 is a console made by JungleTac, and is the successor to the Wireless 60. The console itself resembles Microsoft's Kinect device that comes with the Xbox 360 S consoles. Like the Kinect, the Wireless Air 60 uses your body instead of a physical controller to play games.

name: Wireless 60
description:
The Wireless 60 Gaming System is a video game console developed by JungleTac in 2009, and can be seen as the predecessor to the Wireless Hunting Video Game System.

The console itself is a copy of Nintendo's Wii system, with two controllers that resemble Wii remotes. The controllers communicate with the console via infrared technology, which is the same technology used in television remote controls. The console appears to have "motion-sensing" technology of some sense, but it doesn't quite work properly.

As its name suggests, the console includes 60 games, which are all designed poorly and difficult to play. The games are split into two categories: sports, and arcade. A few of the games also recycle characters from old Disney movies.

Written on the box is also a note which reads, "If you're looking to purchase an Xbox, PlayStation, Wii, or equivalent, this product does not compare or compete with these technologies. The Wireless 60 is a family entertainment console, great for ages 5 and up."

name: Wireless Hunting Video Game System
description:
The Wireless Hunting Video Game System, also known as Wireless, is a console made by JungleTac in 2011.

The console itself utilizes a gun for the controller and comes with twenty games. The gun relies on a motion sensor on the front of the gun's barrel, which then communicates with either the console or a sensor which you can stick to the TV. Because of this, the gun is "wireless" as its name suggests, and uses four AA batteries held in a cartridge which stows in the back of the gun.

name: Dangan
description:
Dangan is a action multiscroll game that is set in a near future and puts the player in control of 2 counter-terrorist agents (Jack & Kate) that will have to defeat different enemies during 8 different operations.

The game features a top down view and different weapons to choose and use.

description:
The VG Pocket 50, also known as VG Pocket, is a VT09-based handheld manufactured by JungleTac and distributed by Performance Design Products. As its name suggests, the VG Pocket 50 has 50 built-in games. Its internal name is VG-2000.

name: VG Pocket Caplet
description:
The VG Pocket Caplet is a 16-bit handheld manufactured by JungleTac and distributed by Performance Designed Products.

The VG Pocket Caplet has 50 built-in games (35 in earlier units), three of which are licensed arcade ports: Space Invaders, Bust-A-Move, and BurgerTime. Many of the included games are listed under a different name than on other JungleTac consoles. Like with most handhelds with built-in games, the high scores and game progress cannot be saved.

name: Sport Vii
description:
The Sport Vii is a video game console similar in aspect to Nintendo's Wii, and it was manufactured by Jungle Soft. It was originally released in China in 2007. The Vii was not intended to be a seventh-generation console like the Wii, and was instead part of the market of inexpensive consoles with built-in games. It is based on the 16-bit Sunplus SPG CPU and has 8.5 MB of internal memory for saving.

Games:

Happy Tennis - a tennis game (similar to Wii Sports Tennis)
Catch Fish - a fishing game (similar to Wii Play Fishing)
Bowling - a bowling game (similar to Wii Sports Bowling)
Alacrity Golf - a minigolf game (similar to Carnival Games: Mini-Golf)
Ping Pong - a table tennis game (similar to Wii Play Table Tennis)
Smart Dart - a simulated darts game
Fry Egg - a cooking game (similar to Cooking Mama)
Bird Knight - a tilt-to-play game (similar to Balloon Fight)
Fever Move - a music and dance game (similar to Dance Dance Revolution / Guitar Hero)
Come On! - A distance game, in-which you feed seals.
Fantasy Baseball - a baseball game (similar to Wii Sports Baseball)
Lucky Dice - a shake Dice Roller designed to simulate dice.

name: VC-1
description:
In addition to the games that were included with the first release of the Vii (Free Craps, which was not included on Vii 2), all models of the Vii also include a cartridge titled 7in1 or 10in1 which respectively features seven and ten preloaded games. Three different cartridges exist (games in double quotes are exclusives.)

This is the first cartridge, with the games:

"MaJong13" (a 'Mahjong-type game)
"MaJong16" (similar to MaJong13)
Bubble Blaster (similar to Puzz Loop and Zuma)
Jewel Master 2 (similar to Magic Jewelry andColumns)
Pinball Fish (similar to Breakout)
Squirrel Bobble (similar to Puzzle Bobble and Bust-A-Move)
Lightning Plan (similar to Silkworm)

name: VC-2

In addition to the games that were included with the first release of the Vii (Free Craps, which was not included on Vii 2), all models of the Vii also include a cartridge titled 7in1 or 10in1 which respectively features seven and ten preloaded games. Three different cartridges exist (games in double quotes are exclusives.)

name: VC-3
description:
In addition to the games that were included with the first release of the Vii (Free Craps, which was not included on Vii 2), all models of the Vii also include a cartridge titled 7in1 or 10in1 which respectively features seven and ten preloaded games. Three different cartridges exist (games in double quotes are exclusives.)

This is the third cartridge, with the games:

"Brave Kaka" (similar to Mario Bros.)

"Magic Jelly" - a Clu Clu Land meets Q*Bert like game

"Tiger Rescue" - an "adventure" game

name: Zone
description:
The first in the Zone line of consoles.

Includes seven games: TV Boxing, VR Tennis, Golf, Extreme Power Soccer, Bowling, Table Tennis, World Series Baseball. There is another version with Fishing instead of Baseball.

name: Zone Interactive
description:
Claims to be 32-bit & 40 games on the packaging, actually has 41. Probably manufactured by Macro Winners but the software is Family Sports 41 in 1 by Senca, and the console seems to detect strength of motion (but not direction) unlike other Zones. Another variant of this system is called the InterAct from Intec.
Sports games: Tennis, Golf, Baseball, Table Tennis, Bowling, Darts, Basketball, Boxing.

name: Zone 40
description:
Zone 40 - Probably manufactured by Subor, most games copyrighted to Waixing.
Games: Golf, Bowling, Baseball, Tennis, Fishing, Competive Fencing, Ping Pong, Soccer, Swimming, Basketball, Darts, Discus, Javelin, High Jump, Long Jump, Triple Jump, 100 Meter, 110 Hurdles, Walking-Race, Sword Of Warriors, Chess Master, Motor Storm, The Mouse And The Cat, Undersea Adventure, Zuma, Highway Racing, Dancing Girls, Box World, Squares, Fire Man, Bomber-Man, Hitting Mice, Shooting Ballons, Snakes, Archery, Fish War, Sudoku, Tanks, Speed Racing and Bee Fighting.

name: Zone Mini
description:
A smaller console with only one controller, designed for portability. 35 games.
Games: Pro Tennis, Super Fighter, Golf Pro, Baseball, Basketball, Bowling, Swimming, Soccer Shooter, Fencing Champ, Badminton, Beach Volleyball, Dart's, Motercycle Ninja, Curling, Ping Pong Cup, Discus, High Jump, Hurdles, Javelin, Bee Eliminator, ArcherY, Racing Course, Racing, Pop Balloons, Snakes, Fire Fighter, Sudoko, Smart Porter, Chess, Catch 22, Simon, Cubes, Scuba Brick, Dance Master, The Mouse and the Cat.

name: Uni's On Air
description: Uni's On Air is a rhythm game featuring songs from Sakurazaka46 and Hinatazaka46. Players can experience various aspects of the real life of idols, communicating with avatars in the “office” area and creating original short stories in the “drama” section.

name: Zone 60
description:
Games by Jungletac but looks identical to the "Smart Station" released in China by Subor. Some of its sports games are similar to those on the Sport Vii, but unlike that console it cannot sense direction or strength of motion. Another variant of this is the Wireless 60.
"Interactive" games (32-bit): Baseball, Basketball, Bowling, Dancing, Darts, Fishing, Golf, Pool, Tennis, Table Tennis.
"Arcade" games (16-bit): Auto Racing, Ball Battle, Big Burger, Brave Heart, Ball Blaster, Caddie, Coin Digger, Cooking Chaos, Crazy Coconuts, Deep Storm, Dragon, Egg Collector, Find The Way, Finger Dancing, Fire Fighter, Fruit Fall, Go Karts, Hay Bales, Hero Legend, Hot Drop, Ice Climber, Jewel Fever, Jewel Master 2, Lady Bugs, Lightning Plan, Magic Cubes, Match It Up, Mission, Motor Rally 2, Mr.Onion, Mystic Totem, Plumber Man, Pop Ball, Potion Commotion, Rapid Stream, Slot Machine, Sudoku, Speed Runner, Spiral Ball, Squirrel Bobble, Starry Night, Surf Adventure, Texas Hold'em, The Lost World, Tiger Rescue, Jet Skiing, Toy Kingdom, Treasure Hunt, Yummy.

name: Zone 100
description: Similar to the Zone 60 but with 40 more games.

name: Zone 3D
description: Contains 20 3D anaglyph games and 80 2D games, credited to Jungletac.

name: Zone Fusion
description:
Zone Fusion - Vertically oriented, made by Jungletac. 30 games.
Games: Jewel Master, Ball Blaster, Imp and Cubes, Push the Box, Flame Beetles, Hard Win, Move Fun, Block Out, Bomb Hero, Mystic Totem, Little Plane, Fossick Underground, Mr. Onion, Beat the Bird, Block Flying, Mr. Ball, Puzzle Pop, Happy Farm, Morra, Find the Way, Climbing Challenge, Worm Catch, Ogriesh Flower, Winlinez, Ball Clash, Win or Lose, Pile the Box, Graden Weeder and Pool Quiz.

name: Zone Family Fit
description: Manufactured by Subor; the software was likely developed by Waixing. It has a mat as controller.

name: Elves '87
description: You play as a retired Christmas elf, brought in at the last moment to help Santa to save Christmas... but first, you have to figure out what is wrong. Explore the North Pole and beyond, meet a few memorable Christmas characters, and save the day before Santa gets too drunk on fancy blended beverages

name: Bundesfighter 2 Turbo
description:
Bundesfighter 2 Turbo is a spoof of Street Fighter 2 released by Bohemian Browser Balett as a satirical take on the German elections (also known as Bundestagswahl) of 2017.
The player can choose between Angela Merkel (CDU), Martin Schulz (SPD), Özdehardt (Grüne), Sarah Wagenknecht (Linke), Alexander Gauland (AFD) and Christian Lindner (FDP), all having movesets based on conspirancies, jokes and prejudices surrounding their parties.

name: Posterdle
description:
You have 20 seconds and 6 guesses to figure out the movie poster.

Every day there will be a new poster to guess. Have fun and good luck!

name: Angle
description:
Guess the Angle in 4 guesses or less!

Each time you make a guess it will tell you how close you are and which direction to go.

name: PortaBoy+
description: Congrats on purchasing your very own PORTABOY! Are you ready, GAMER? You're about to enter a fun world filled with challenging minigames. Stay focused, and do your best! Leave the rest to us!

name: Statele
description: Guess the state in 6 guesses! After each guess, you will have the distance, the direction and the proximity from your guess to the target location.

name: WhereTaken USA
description:
The aim of the game is to guess what US state the photo was taken in.
If you guess incorrectly, the game will tell you how far away you are, and displays an arrow that points in the direction of the correct US state.

name: WhereTaken Classic
description:
The aim of the game is to guess what country/region the photo was taken in.
If you guess incorrectly, the game will tell you how far away you are, and displays an arrow, that points in the direction of the correct country/region.
A new WhereTaken will be available everyday!

name: Emovi
description: Guess a movie with emoji!

name: Rune Factory 3 Special: Golden Memories Edition
description:
Rune Factory 3 Special “Golden Memories Edition” includes the following content:

Custom outer box featuring an original illustration based on the game’s anime opening
Rune Factory 3 Special Switch game card and case
An acrylic standee featuring protagonists from Rune Factory 3 Special, Rune Factory 4 Special, and Rune Factory 5 measuring six inches wide and four inches tall
An original soundtrack CD
A custom five-by-eight inches planner containing in-game seasons in addition to a real world calendar
Exclusive downloadable content “Swimsuit Mode” allowing for characters to appear in their swimsuits year-round

name: Flagle
description:
Guess the hidden flag in six tries.
After each guess, pixels of the solution that overlap with the guessed flag will be revealed.

name: Flagle
description:
Guess the flag in 6 guesses or less!
Each time you make a guess it will reveal another portion of the flag and give you a geographical hint.

name: Dragon Money
description: Dragon Money is a board game up to 4 players in which the player can choose 1 of 6 different characters and play the board.

name: A Tiny Sticker Tale
description: A Tiny Sticker Tale is a cozy miniature adventure about changing the world, using the power of stickers!

name: Horror em Amityville
description: Horror em Amityville is a horror text adventure for the MSX.

name: Yoshi Goes to Tesco
description: Browse the aisles for the items on your grocery list, get into some trouble, and solve minor puzzles in this short (15-25 minute) shitpost about the wonders and terrors of retail, with dumb references to outdated memes, copyright infringement and jokes about British "culture."

name: Crazy Road: Trouble Racer
description:
Compete your ranking in real time through out the world!
Your car is broken. It moves/turns toward right direction unless you control.
Don't forget to repair your mini car! Collect repair tools before your car burned out!
Experience the sudden acceleration. :)

name: Just Turn Right
description:
Forget the brakes! You can do nothing but turn right!
Just drive a car from the point A to the point B! Sounds easy? What if you can do nothing but turn right?
Forget the brakes! Forget the seat belts! Get your finger ready and prepare yourself for really fast ride full of crashes, obstacles, explosions, driftings and jumps!

name: Way of Tanks
description: Way of Tanks is the first and only tank race in the world. Speed up, overcome obstacles and traps as fast as you can! Destroy the enemies, use and upgrade your tank's super powers. Way of Tanks is the world of steel armor, clever maneuvers and adrenaline. Compete with your friends, drive your tank forward and become a true hero. Join the tanks army right now!

name: Crazy Bikers 3
description:
The craziest bike race around the world is back! Crazy Bikers 3, the best bicycle racing game ever is here!

Cool and crazy bicycles with turbo boost, extreme jumps and stunts, full rider and bike evolutions - all in Crazy Bikers 3!

name: Maximum Car
description:
Drift and boost your way through 5 unique game worlds in one hundred tasty looking cars. Battle your way to victory, complete missions or enjoy the slow mo takedown cams as you explode fellow racers with missiles - perhaps from the comfort of an Ice Cream Van.

It’s up to you...

name: Mean Machines
description: Mean Machines is a one-of-a-kind action-racing game inspired by Demolition Derby, RC Racing and Robot Wars. With beautifully textured environments, realistic physics and damage models and a tremendous variety of content and game modes, Mean Machines is your definitive daily dose of action in the most accessible, pick-up-and-play package for mobile!

name: Pudding Bang 2
description: A new style of Whack-A-Mole Game with Cute Puddings. Puddings are trying to break out from mobile. Please stop them!

name: Hardwood Rivals
description: It's time for basketball! The sequel to Basketball Time is back and better than ever. Hardwood Rivals introduces revamped shot mechanics and lets you customize your own player!

name: Graveyard Keeper: Last Journey Edition
description: The ultimate Graveyard Keeper experience with a complete set of all 4 DLCs!

name: Agatha Christie: Hercule Poirot - The London Case
description: Hercule Poirot is back in a brand-new adventure, set in the heart of London.

name: Smiley's Way Out
description:
A Maze game? A Labyrinth game? A Pipe game?
Its a very new, Innovative maze puzzle game with 200+ levels.

name: Lost Lands
description:
Lost Lands has a treasure hunting theme with a simple goal in each level - picking up a gem to accumulate collection value. But you need to find your way through doors that open one way but block another. It starts with 4 doors, but as the number of doors increases, finding your way could be mind-boggling. You are challenged to accumulate more than one million dollars of collection value.

Seeking more challenge? The game provides a second play mode where you are awarded with stars for shorter routes.

name: Diamond Gems
description: Simple and smooth game play, great music and amazing graphics. Three addictive game types in one, which brings you the ultimate gems blasting experience... plus more.

name: Mahjong 2 Classroom
description:
A Premium Mahjong for Everyone
Whether you play Mahjong everyday or want to learn how to master this game, Mahjong 2 Classroom was made for you!
Based on an old Chinese solitaire game, Mahjong is a free solitaire matching game which uses a set of Mahjong tiles. The goal of this pyramid game is to match open pairs of identical tiles and remove them from the board, exposing the tiles under them for play. You will be challenged to eliminate all pieces from the board.
In this brand new 3D version, we bring you stunning HD graphics. Experts will have the opportunity to play with the classic Mahjong tiles. Beginners will be introduced to the game through simpler and very colorful tiles based on all the classics from Magma Mobile.
For those of you who like brain and puzzle game, chess, checkers or backgammons, you will for sure enjoy this Premium Mahjong !

name: Paths: Beatrice's Adventure
description: Paths: Beatrice’s Adventure is a choice and consequences game in which the player will get the chance to live and shape Beatrice’s life.

name: Hit Tennis 3
description: Swipe or flick your finger to hit the ball. It feels like real tennis!

name: Basketball Odyssey
description:
Shoot hoops and unlock new worlds on this addictive and relaxing basketball game!
Basketball Odyssey is a different basketball experience. A journey of calm and relaxation due to its music and ambient sounds, while you feel the satisfaction from overcoming a challenge.

name: 100% Golf
description:
Putt with percentages in this chill golf game.
Use your 100 percentage points of power to get it to the hole!

name: Footy Ball: Pass Pass Soccer
description:
The new lean, mean game of soccer. Fast, high-tempo games of football designed for pick-up and play.
Quick matches where the players auto-run and you use one finger to pass and score wonderful goals. Its easy to learn but hard to master in this semi-retro game.
Take your fictitious team from the lower leagues at the start of the 2017 - 2018 season to the top tier of your chosen country.

name: Catch Fish
description: Sin descripción

name: Ping Pong
description: Sin descripción

name: Fry Egg
description: Sin descripción

name: Come On!
description: Sin descripción

name: Bird Knight
description: Sin descripción

name: Fantasy Baseball
description: Sin descripción

name: Lucky Dice
description: Sin descripción

name: Fever Move
description: Sin descripción

name: Alacrity Golf
description: Sin descripción

name: Smart Dart
description: Sin descripción

name: Happy Tennis
description: Sin descripción

name: Bowling
description: Sin descripción

name: I'm On a Watcher Duty 2: Paranormal in Gensokyo
description: A sequel to the first "I'm on a watcher duty". This time, it takes place in Gensokyo. Enjoy.

name: I'm On a Watcher Duty 3: The Invasion
description: Another sequel of "I'm on a watcher duty" series. This one is in the theme of the hand-made maps made by Paulor94. Enjoy.

name: I'm On a Watcher Duty 4: The Community Place
description: This time, we're in the community place. The place where people that like these community will be gathered. However, these community places are being haunted by anomalies and it's your job to take a care of it. Good luck fellow watcher.

name: I'm On a Watcher Duty 5: Returning to Gensokyo
description: You got requested by Yukari to go back to Gensokyo one more time because anomalies still happening there. You accepted the request and head back there immediately. You now back to your duty again.

name: I'm On a Watcher Duty 6: Home of Anomalies
description: Story: You came back from Gensokyo but your job isn't over yet. You wanted to find out what exactly happened so you decided to continue working as a watcher duty.

name: Viking Rise
description: Explorar, construir e conquistar Midgard!

name: I'm On a Watcher Duty 7: The Familiar Places
description: Story: You are now playing as another person and you get brought to one of the company by Yukari because she wanted to make you have a skill on spotting the anomalies by using the simulation that this company provided to you. You'll be doing a watcher duty job inside the simulation in a very familiar places.

name: Scrap Bolts
description: Accelerate across platforms, fly over ramps and jump on trampolines to recover all the lost pieces.

name: Dark Quest 3
description: A rogue-lite tabletop that mixes card based exploration with turn based combat. Create your party, draw adventure cards, roll dice and fight monsters to defeat the sorcerer and his magic.

name: Crash Team Rumble: Deluxe Edition
description:
This Edition includes:
- Crash Team Rumble for PS4 / PS5
- Digital Proto Pack. Includes:
- 8 'Blocky' hero skins
- 'Pixelated' Shadow
- 'Get On My Level' In-Game Victory Music
- 'Blocky' Hat
- 'Blocky' Backpack
- 'Blocky' Score FX
- Unique Banner

name: Shame Legacy: The Cult Edition
description:
Shame Legacy is a first-person survival-horror, set in a forsaken cultist village. You attempt to survive using stealth and escape. By solving puzzles, you unravel the mystery that's h(a)unting you.

The Cult Edition includes special case and metallic-effect post card

name: Everspace 2: Stellar Edition
description:
EVERSPACE 2: Stellar Edition Includes:
- Base game
- SteelBook case
- Digital original soundtrack.

name: Neon Echo
description: Neon Echo is a 3D side-scrolling action Roguelite game with an anime and tech-wear style.

name: Bubble Bobble Micro Player
description: Popping onto the scene in 1986, this is the epic adventure of brothers Bob and Bub, who have been transformed into dragons, and must battle through 100 levels to save their girlfriends. Featuring simple yet strategic gameplay, Bubble Bobble continues to be a fan favorite and is consistently ranked among the best games of all time.

name: Galaga Micro Player
description: Get ready to face-off­ against bug-like aliens again in this sequel to Galaxian. Galaga was first released in 1981 and is just as popular and beloved as its predecessor but kicks it up a notch with even more awesome space-tastic features.

name: Super Mario Odyssey: Yoshi Star Kingdom
description: A Super Mario Galaxy themed level mod for Super Mario Odyssey.

name: Silent Hill Exotica
description: Silent Hill Exotica is a mod for the Xbox version for Grand Theft Auto: Vice City that is based on the Silent Hill series. The mod was considered lost media for years, often times just being considered a myth, until it later resurfaced in 2023.

name: Buddytale
description: Buddytale is exploration of our attachments to virtual pets, our responsibilities as their caretakers, and the way digital mortality effects the value we place on our relationships to computational entities. It is a series of vignettes, little snapshots into the relationship between an owner and their pet, from the day they meet until they must say goodbye.

name: Angry Birds Electronic Handheld Game
description: An unofficial LCD game based on the Angry Birds series that was on sale on Amazon from 2012 to 2014.

name: Angry Birds Dice Adventure
description: Angry Birds Dice Adventure is an upcoming game in the Angry Birds series.

name: Shooting Star VR
description: Become a hero in Shooting Star VR! Choose from 4 themes and 100 stages to save the goddess of Archery Land with your magic bow. Travel through forests, lava pits, icy mountains, and space to defeat monsters and restore peace. Get ready for thrilling challenges and heroic feats

name: Duet Cats
description: The music world of cute popcat are out now - c a t s sounds. Let's control the hottest popcat duet ever. Who will be the diva cat in this cats tower?

name: Tri-Heli 2
description: In Tri-Heli II the player pilots a chopper and must collect diamonds that are buried in the ground. To reach the diamonds the player must use the choppers gun to blast holes in the ground. But once the player starts to "dig" a plane that flies at the top of the screen will start dumping dirt over the hole to fill it up. Once a diamond has been collected the player must return to the helipad before picking up another diamond. When enough diamonds has been collected it's of to the next level. The ground level varies between levels. To add to the difficulty guns will drop from the sky from time to time. Once these hits the ground they will start firing.

name: Auto X
description: A racing game taking place on a pirate island.

name: Ball Blaster
description: Same as the VT3xx-based Ball Blaster gameplay-wise, though the graphics are unique; featuring a girl using the launcher and a small creature in the bottom-right. It does not seem to be based on either of the Disney Game It! Zuma clones in coding.

name: Winlinez
description: Clone of Lines, or some variation thereof.

name: Blue
description: The player controls a frog and must collect items across the bubbles.

name: Bomb Hero
description: Same as the VT3xx-based Bomb Hero. The version titled Bomb Hero is identical to the VT3xx game visually (including the Kirbys and Jigglypuffs), while additionally using music from Bomberman II; the version titled Hero features different graphics, and uses Boos from the Mario series as enemies.

name: Box Puzzle
description: Loosely based on Soukoban, the player must move boxes to form paths across a series of islands.

name: Brave Heart
description: Somewhat a clone of the original Mario Bros., though the player must climb ladders to reach higher platforms instead of jumping.

name: Flame Beetles
description: Make all of the beetles touch each other. The "sunflower counter" graphic (seen when losing a level) is taken from Hamtaro: Rainbow Rescue.

name: Bump Jump
description: Enhanced port of the NES-based Block Out.

name: Busy Bong
description:
A Soukoban clone. Busy Bong features Egyptian-like visuals, while Busy Busy features standard warehouse graphics.
Included in the Zeus, a handheld/plug-n-play game console manufactured by Lexibook Limited.

name: Caddie
description: A clone of Dharma Dojo for the Super Famicom, with unique visuals.

name: Campaign
description: The player controls a bear, and must jump across very small platforms to collect bananas.

name: Deep Storm
description: A shooting game with a pseudo-3D perspective.

name: Defence Mission
description: A clone of Battle City with people instead of tanks.

name: Dragon
description: A platforming game somewhat similar to Rainbow Islands. To reach certain platforms and/or defeat enemies, the player must launch a "dragon" which can be walked across momentarily.

name: Dream Bubble
description: Same as the VT3xx-based game. A Tetris clone similar to Magic Diamond, though it is seemingly coded differently. The game features a "special mode" which merely turns the screen upside down.

name: Final Escape
description: Clone of Pengo.

name: Final Round Tennis
description: A tennis game with somewhat realistic graphics; different to the "Wii clone" Tennis game.

name: Find Food
description: The player controls a caveman, and must navigate a series of doors to collect the food scattered around the stage.

name: Find the Way
description: Unrelated to the VT3xx game, instead playing like a more complex version of the VTxx-based game Flying.

name: Finger Dancing
description: The player controls a girl in a penguin costume, and must leap across platforms by pressing the corresponding button shown on the platform (e.g. up, down, left or right on the controller).

name: Fire Fighter
description: Different than the VT09 version; it is still a clone of Flying Hero, but with different levels.

name: Fruit Fall
description: Also known as Fruit Rotation, though the Sunplus port uses the actual Fruit Fall name and features a password system.

name: Garden Weeder
description: Carefully maneuver the mower to cut all of the grass without hitting the Bibarels (a character from Pokemon). Otis from the movie Barnyard appears in the bottom-left corner.

name: Go Bang
description: Same gameplay as Ball Battle or Winlinez, though it is a different game code-wise.

name: Go, Smile
description: A clone of Go! Go! Mile Smile. Some levels feature Pookas from Dig Dug as enemies.

name: Happy Farm
description: A clone of the Flash game Happy Pill. Hit the rabbits with the carrot until they are all blushing; you cannot hit them too many times or else you will lose.

name: Hero Legend
description: Clone of Don Doko Don! starring a modified and recolored version of the sprite used for Link in The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords and The Legend of Zelda: The Minish Cap.

name: Hot Drop
description: The player controls Mr. Frosty from the Kirby series, and must collect objects in the clouds; he then must enter the UFO at the bottom of the screen. Mr. Frosty can blow bubblegum bubbles to fly to the platforms.

name: Ice Climber
description: Clone of the NES game of the same name.

name: Jewel Fever
description: A Magical Drop clone; it does not seem to be based on either of the Disney Game It! clones in coding. The player character seems to loosely resemble Mario dressed as a pirate.

name: Jewel Master
description: Same as the VT3xx-based version of Jewel Master.

name: Jump Frog
description: A peg game featuring frogs.

name: Lightning Plan
description: A side-scrolling shooting game.

name: The Lost World
description: A somewhat Frogger-like game with a military theme.

name: Magic Cubes
description: A Tetris clone; the music is taken from Balloon Fight.

name: Magic Jelly
description: The player controls a girl on a broomstick, and must lay "magic bombs" to turn all stage tiles to a different color.

name: Coin Digger
description: Same as the VT3xx-based gameplay-wise, though the graphics are unique. The Game Boy Advance version features Dora the Explorer controlling the crane.

name: Match it Up
description: Effectively the same as the VT-based game Pair Memo, though new tiles spawn from the top of the screen instead of the bottom.

name: Mission
description: A side-scrolling platformer.

name: Motor Rally 2
description: Enhanced port of the NES-based Motor Rally.

name: Iso Racer
description: Iso Racer is a top-down multiplayer racing game with a focus on realistic driving physics combined with drifting. It features a variety of circuits, cars, and the ability to personalize and upgrade vehicles. It's a great pick-up-and-play experience for both casual and hardcore racing fans.

name: Mr. Onion
description: Enhanced port of the NES-based One Day of Mr. Potato; some sound effects are taken from Galaga. The title screen of the Sunplus version features modified artwork of Pac-Man from Pac-Mania.

name: Mystic Totem
description: Get the rings around the totem to the other side. Later hacked to create Move It (VT3xx).

name: On N Off
description: A clone of Lights Out!.

name: Pinball Fish
description: Despite the name, it is a Breakout clone.

name: Plumber
description: A side-scrolling platformer; oddly, the game has no music. In the Game Boy Advance version, there are voice lines seemingly taken from a South Park game, which have nothing to do with the game's context whatsoever (the lines being "You are lame at that game!", "Nice moves!", and "You unlocked some goodies in the candy store this time!").

name: Pool Pro
description: Enhanced port of the NES-based game. While the original version is visually based on Side Pocket, the Sunplus and GBA ports are instead based on Minnesota Fats: Pool Legend for the Sega Genesis.

name: Pop Ball
description: Clone of Pang! starring Ness from Earthbound. Later hacked to create Bubble Master (VT3xx) and Magic Ball (VT3xx).

name: Puzzle Pop
description: Move the tiles to pop the bubbles.

name: Quick Move
description: Sin descripción

name: Rapid Stream
description: The player must guide a submarine through a path without crashing into walls (which will explode the submarine on contact), while shooting at enemies.

name: Rolling Cube
description: A clone of the Flash game Bloxorz.

name: Seek the Resources
description: A top-down game where the player must collect coins. The player character is the Pokemon Trainer from Pokemon FireRed.

name: Sudoku
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Move Quest
description: A basic puzzle game similar to Move Fun.

name: Toy Kingdom
description: A game similar to Flicky, in which a girl must rescue the creatures and lead them to the escape doorway; enemies can be defeated by throwing furniture.

name: Treasure Hunt
description: The player must collect all of the gems. Oddly, the level layout and mechanics are similar to Lode Runner, but the gameplay is largely different (and much more basic).

name: Tutelary
description: A rather advanced platformer where an angel must collect coins; the angel can fly, but can only flap her wings up to three times in one jump.

name: Which Way
description: The player controls a dog with a baby on his back, and must avoid obstacles.

name: Win or Lose
description: You control a paddle and must bounce the balls until the timer runs out.

name: Wobble
description: The player controls a monkey somewhat resembling Diddy Kong, and must attempt to balance a glass of juice without letting it spill.

name: Yummy
description: A clone of Gussun Oyoyo with original graphics. The player character is the same girl from Magic Jelly.

name: Zippy Froger
description: There are several frogs and caterpillars on the screen. The player must strategically bounce the frogs' tongues off of each other in order to reach and eat all caterpillars.

name: Black Jack
description: Sin descripción

name: Caribbean Stud
description: Sin descripción

name: Free Craps
description: Sin descripción

name: Slot Machine
description: Sin descripción

name: Texas Hold'Em
description: Sin descripción

name: Video Poker
description: Sin descripción

name: One Day of Mr. Potato
description: A platforming game where the player must collect keys to free the imprisoned "potato". The player cannot jump, only climb ladders. The main characters strongly resemble Kirby, but they are actually modified versions of Tiki from The NewZealand Story. Later hacked to create Defender (VT09).

name: Pool Pro
description: Sin descripción

name: Pair Memo
description: Sin descripción

name: Block Out
description: Sin descripción

name: Motor Rally
description: Sin descripción

name: Snood
description: Licensed port of Snood for NES-based plug & plays.

name: Snood Towers
description: A licensed port of Snood for NES-based platforms.

name: BurgerTime
description: Licensed port of the arcade game. Later hacked to create Big Burger.

name: Bust-A-Move
description: Licensed port of the arcade game. Later hacked to create Squirrel Bobble.

name: Squirrel Bobble
description: Sin descripción

name: Big Burger
description: Sin descripción

name: Elfland
description: Clone of the 1992 game of the same name. Despite using the same graphics as the original, it is not based on the same engine, and was ported from scratch. It is unknown if JungleTac's version was a licensed port or not.

name: Fire Fighter
description: Clone of Flying Hero for the Famicom.

name: Move Fun
description: A basic puzzle game. Later hacked to create Fruit Fall (VT3xx).

name: Space Invaders Part II
description: Licensed port of the arcade game.

name: Frogger
description: Licensed port from Konami. An alternate 2017 revision from Basic Fun changes the music tracks.

name: Construction Simulator: JCB Pack
description:
The JCB Pack further enhances your Construction Simulator experience with six brand-new machines. Enjoy more variety when tackling your construction contracts!

The JCB Pack includes:

• 1CXT – Backhoe Loader
• 220X – Excavator
• 457 – Wheel Loader
• 4CX – Backhoe Loader
• 540-180 – Telehandler
• 6T-2 – Site Dumper

name: Scramble
description: Licensed port from Konami. Later hacked to create Night Wings (VT3xx).

name: Construction Simulator: Year 1 Season Pass
description:
Expand your Construction Simulator experience with the Year 1 Season Pass! It includes 21 brand-new machines, new mission campaigns, two cosmetic packages as DLCs, and a season pass helmet – all in one package.

The Year 1 Season Pass contains:

• Exclusive Season Pass Helmet – available now!
• JCB Pack with 6 brand-new machines
• Cosmetic Pack #1, including two helmets, new safety glasses, and additional ear protection for your avatar
• The Airfield Expansion features a brand-new campaign with airfield-related contracts, adding more than 30 hours of gameplay on both Sunny Haven and Friedenberg
• Cosmetic Pack #2, including new skins for helmets
• The SANY Pack adds 15 new machines from the renowned Chinese manufacturer
• The Spaceport Expansion includes a brand-new map inspired by a tropical peninsula and three exclusive campaigns that add more than 40 hours of gameplay

name: Time Pilot
description: Licensed port from Konami.

name: Star Ally
description: Star Ally is a space shooter game developed by JungleTac, and is included on numerous plug and plays. This game is very similar to the Famicom title Recca. It is based on VT09 hardware.

name: A Little to the Left: Cupboards & Drawers
description: Sort, stack, and organize household objects into particular arrangements in A Little to the Left: Cupboards & Drawers. Prepare to clean out the cabinets and secret compartments of the home with even more charming illustrations, surprising scenarios, and 25 delightful new Cupboards & Drawers themed puzzles to discover.

name: Shovel Knight: Pocket Dungeon - Puzzler's Pack DLC
description: This DLC adds new characters, areas, quests, relics, and more.

name: Cult of the Lamb: Relics of the Old Faith
description: This update adds new relics, fleeces, attacks, followers, buildings, crusades, minibosses, encounters, quests, harder bosses, and a photo mode with stickers.

name: Teslagrad Remastered
description: Teslagrad Remastered is an updated version of the original Teslagrad, developed by Rain Games and released in 2023. This remastered edition features enhanced graphics, improved animations, and updated sound design while retaining the core puzzle-platforming mechanics of the original game. Players continue to use magnetism and electricity to navigate puzzles and obstacles within a mysterious tower, with the remastered version providing a refined visual and auditory experience.

name: Escape Academy: The Complete Edition
description: Escape Academy: The Complete Edition includes Escape Academy, Escape From Anti-Escape Island DLC, Escape From the Past DLC, and the Tournament of Puzzles competitive race mode!

name: Dead or Alive 5: Last Round - Character: Naotora Ii
description:
With lightning fast leg strikes, Naotora Ii leaps into the fray! This mashup brings together the action of Samurai Warriors and the fighting entertainment of Dead or Alive 5 Last Round. Defeat the strongest fighters for the honor of the Ii clan!

Naotora Ii joins Dead or Alive 5 Last Round as a playable character!

Download this to use Naotora Ii in Dead or Alive 5 Last Round

name: Van-Gale: The War of Neo-Century
description: Van-Gale: The War of Neo-Century is an Action game, developed by Aroma and published by Yumedia, which was released in Japan in 1997.

name: Glimby
description: It’s me! It’s me! Glimby! I’m your friend!

name: Launch The Baby
description: Launch The Baby is a silly and fun game where you launch your baby out of a cannon to gain points. With these points you can customize your baby with many options to go full absurd. These points will also allow you to unlock new levels and other beneficial tools when launching.

name: Mormonoids From The Deep
description: "Mormonoids From the Deep is a satirical adventure game loosely based on the writings of Hunter S. Thompson, H.P. Lovecraft, and the Book of Mormon. The object of the games is to destroy the evil Yogsoggsmith and escape from the town of Mormonville without sobering up. Armed only with a Colt .45, a Hertz rent-a-car, and your last six-pack, can you save the day and rescue "Unwholesome Olson"?

name: Unrecord
description: Unrecord is a tactical shooter where players can expect an immersive and narrative experience. Unrecord features complex dialogues, innovative gameplay mechanics, tough moral dilemmas, and a unique shooting system. The storyline in Unrecord can be compared to a detective novel or a thriller. The player will have to investigate several criminal cases and confront a diverse cast of characters. The game's plot and presentation will be central to the gameplay experience, and players can anticipate a range of gameplay sequences as well as numerous plot twists.

name: MaJong13
description: Sin descripción

name: MaJong16
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Move Fun
description: Sin descripción

name: Brave Kaka
description: Sin descripción

name: Montana Jones
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Defend
description: Defend the earth from incoming asteroids. Hit asteroids to destroy them. Survive the Waves.

name: Idle Space Force
description:
A retro idle adventure that plays like a top down shooter!
Join the Idle Space Force and take a journey through space to unique 8 bit worlds as you collect enough loot to make your way back home, upgrade your ship, and discover hidden treasure along the way!

name: Stone Wheel
description:
Stone Wheel is a funny game where you must control a big rolling wheel through 30 levels. Whit its original and colouful graphics Stone Wheel will be a pleasant time-killer, simple but addicting. Choose from 2 different control styles: touch or accelerometer.
You will need to jump, accelerate, break and have a perfect control of your stone in order to complete all levels!

name: Air Cavalry: Flight Simulator
description:
More than 5,000,000 people around the world downloaded Air Cavalry flight sim!
Get into the cockpit of the most advanced helicopters in the world, including the UH-60 Black Hawk, MV-22B Osprey, CH-47 Chinook, AH-64 Apache, UH-1 Iroquois, OH-6 Cayuse, AH-1Z Cobra, CH-53 Super Stallion, Eurocopter Tiger, Kiowa Warrior, Mi-24 Hind, Ka-50 Black Shark or Mi-8 Hip helicopter in various regional environments, building on your flying skills and experience. Enjoy infinite flight in legendary helicopters like a real combat pilot.

name: City Rush
description:
Lead the cars and beat the time records! Thousands of people love City Rush!
Control the city’s traffic on junctions. Isn’t it the most challenging game ever?
Please note: City Rush is completely free to play but some in-game items such as maps will require payment. You can turn-off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

name: Derby Quest: Horse Manager HD
description: The Ultimate Horse Breeding, Training, and Racing Game! Grow your stable with many horses and train them to become Derby Champions. Breed your champion race horses to create 'super baby' horses that become even faster! Derby Quest is an amazing horse care-taking and racing simulation game. It's a game full of strategy and arcade action.

name: Farmer Drift!
description: Parked! Collect money! Get out of the parking lot! How far can you go?

name: Monster Truck Ramp Stunt
description:
Its an action-adventure game for risk-takers. This monster truck simulator game provides you the right dose of crazy fun and impossible challenges. It’s time to show your car driving skills on the impossible tracks on the sky. Bring out your inner stuntman, dash through the extreme deadly tracks. It’s the ultimate car driving simulator stunt game you have been waiting for.
Embark on an epic journey of impossible stunts. Turn on the engine and be prepared for the most thrilling ride. We know your love for monster truck performing crazy stunts. So try it yourself!
Take control of the wheels in the extreme stunt game, Use acceleration, Brakes and steering wisely to avoid falling down. Drive insanely, speed up and make your truck jump through mega ramps to complete challenges. Isn't it the best truck games you always dreamt of.
Once you become a champion player in Monster Trucks Stunt Racing 3D, then even sky is not the limit for you!

name: Baby Arms
description: Clone of the Game & Watch game Donkey Kong 3.

name: Bird Hunter
description: Sin descripción

name: Climbing Challenge
description: Clone of Donkey Kong Jr. starring what appears to be Funky Kong. Levels 3 and 4 from the original are swapped around.

name: Brains Diamonds
description: Navigate the cube to collect all of the coins and land in the star tile.

name: Bubble Hero
description: Collect the stars while avoiding the cannonballs.

name: Close Shell
description: Clone of Lights Out!.

name: Code Eagle!
description: Clone of the arcade game Intrepid. The player must go into all of the castle's rooms and steal the items hidden within them. In the top room, the player must give the ID ticket to the guard in order to steal the safe. Then the castle must be exited as quickly as possible. The main character appears to be a modified version of Bomberman.

name: Dart
description: A basic darts game for consoles with VT3xx chip.

name: Dodgeman
description: Clone of the minigame Cavity Calamity from Warioware, Inc., turned into a full game. When the player dies, a voice sample of Fred Flintstone saying "Yabba Dabba Doo!" is played.

name: Explore
description: A game comprised of small platforming-puzzle challenges. Seemingly higher-budget than the other titles.

name: Farm Pinball
description: A pinball game. Later hacked to create Go Soccer (VT3xx).

name: Final Ninja
description: You control a ninja who must hit samurai using a crosshair.

name: Find the Way
description: Guide the chicken down the right path to collect the egg.

name: Heart Fragment: Book Three - Despair Fragments
description:
Includes Natalia and Jasper's routes.

Your progress towards the truth leaves you desperate for answers in this tangled web of fear in Book Three: Despair Fragments. "Fantasy" has been torn apart, "belief" becomes increasingly twisted, and "despair" threatens to engulf it all. Book Three reveals intentions and motives that you may have begun to piece together through the previous routes, but what will you discover by examining that evidence from the viewpoint of the villain?

name: Wind Fantasy SP: The Moment of Sealing The God
description:
Two hundred years ago, the devil Medicis launched a war against humans because of the death of his beloved, the saint Lilith. ．．The leader of mankind, Arthur, the King of Light who personally executed the saint Lilith, raised his holy sword to resist for the survival of the world of light. The war caused by the love affair between Lilith, the Saint of Light, and the Demon Lord Medicis lasted for seven years. ．．

The revenge war of the Demon King Medicis against the Holy King of Light was not successful. In the last battle of the Holy Demon Palace, the Holy King of Light Arthur defeated the Demon King Medicis with a sacrificed attack. In order to prevent all disasters, human beings at that time used the power of the absolute magic circle to seal all the dark people at the end of time and space.

name: Advance Wars Returns
description: Advance Wars Returns is a romhack of Advance Wars 2 and it contains a brand new story with 42 new campaign missions in both a normal and a hard difficulty, a completely new War Room with 30 missions, an AWBW section in Vs. Mode for your PvP desires and reworked CO-Power mechanics and COs.

name: Luminesweeper
description: Luminesweeper, pronounced as "luminous sweeper", is a 2-in-1 combo of Lumines and Minesweeper. The game includes a fairly wide variety of skins and a compiler for creating your own skins.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online Collection: Necrom
description:
Traverse the Telvanni Peninsula in Morrowind and preserve secrets ascribed to the unfathomable realms of Apocrypha. Unlock the runic power of a brand-new class - the Arcanist - and fight to uphold reality itself.

The Collection: Necrom contains the base game, Necrom and all previous Chapters. Pre-purchase to get the Spore mount instantly and more items at launch.

name: Deceive Inc.: Misery Empire
description: A ghost from Ace's past has returned to break hearts and take names in Misery Empire: Deceive Inc's first seasonal catalog update. Featuring tons of gameplay improvements and fixes, over 50 exclusive new items to unlock, and Red - the devilishly charming new Scoundrel Agent!
